discussiontools-autotopicsubpopup-body: Sɛ obi de nsɛm foforɔ to mpɛnsɛmpɛnsɛmu adaka yi mu a wɔbɛnya nkaebɔ. Wobɛtumi asesa baabi biribi kɔso wɔ wo nkaebɔ nom sɛnea wopɛ no.
discussiontools-preference-autotopicsub-: Sɛ wohyɛ mpɛnsɛmpɛnsɛmu foforɔ ase anaa sɛ woka biribi fa mpɛnsɛmpɛnsɛmu bi a ɛwɔ hɔ dada ho a, sɛ afoforɔ ka nsɛm foforɔ fa ho a wɔ aberɛ a w'ani nna woho so no wobɛnya nkaebɔ
